PracticePotion.NAME: Practice Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Upgrade  #b1 random card in your deck.
Upgrade  #b2 random card in your deck.

MagicPotion.NAME: Magic Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose #b1 of #b3 random #yMagic cards to add to your hand, it costs #b0 this turn.
Choose #b1 of #b3 random #yMagic cards and add #b2 copies to your hand, they cost #b0 this turn.
